Package buffalo3d.core

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RendererGLSurfaceViewProxy.SnapshotCallback
    A callback interface used to return glSurfaceView snapshot.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Color4BufferList  
    FacesBufferedList  
    GContext  
    ManagedLightList  
    MatrixStack
    A matrix stack, similar to OpenGL ES's internal matrix stack.
    MultisampleConfigChooser  
    Number3dBufferList  
    Object3d
    This class represents the basic building block for user interface components.
    Object3dContainer
    A Object3dContainer is a special object3d that can contain other object3d (called children.)
    RenderCaps
    Simple static class holding values representing various capabilities of hardware's concrete OpenGL capabilities that are relevant to buffalo3d's supported features.
    Renderer
    The engine rendering proxy which parse all object collection and reference GL effect settings to draw specified scene.
    RendererActivity
    Extend this class when creating your buffalo3d-based Activity.
    RendererGLSurfaceView
    Extend this class when creating your buffalo3d-based GLSurfaceView.
    RendererGLSurfaceViewProxy  
    Scene
    The top of a object3d hierarchy, storing all the needed configurations of GL scene.
    TextureList
    Manages a list of TextureVo's used by Object3d's.
    TextureManager
    TextureManager is responsible for managing textures for the whole environment.
    UvBufferList  
    Vertices  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Object3d.VBO_ID
